column3: ## Successfully upload a file containing an updated article
Setup: Run through the previous test to upload a new article
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select the test resource file "update.xml" from the Crossref 5.3.1 resources

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/3922_change_recaptcha_to_honeypot/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/update.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown

column4: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

column3: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

column4: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "successfully processed", and the Note "1 articles imported (0 new, 1 updated)"

column3:
Go to the Table of Contents for the journal (e.g. by going to /toc/2222-2222), and go to the Articles tab

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//toc/2222-2222

column4: The list of articles should contain an article with the title "Updated!", and the previous version ("Success!") should be gone
